component.name: Kraken
component.summary: Free and open source 3D creation suite

description.p: Kraken is the future of 3D graphics for film, animation, and the future of interactive digital experiences. It supports a Hydra Powered Viewport capable of rendering any engine from Arnold, to Renderman, a real-time, physically based render engine called PHOENIX and many more production tools are coming soon.

Currently in development is a wide range of procedural tools such as a modeler, rigger, animation framework, simulation engine, render farm integrator, interprocess framework, and more. Built upon the Pixar Production pipeline, and ready to blow a hole in your GPU. We're just as excited as you are to kick this off to brand-new heights.

Kraken is in it's very early development stages. Join the development fund and help us evolve Kraken over the next several years. Together we can build the future of animation, and build the tools the way we want to use them. Development is moving rapidly and we are consistantly supporting new tools as they are made available. Drop us a line and we'll be happy to implement all sorts of community driven ideas.
